text: Maga jab hazrat essa (alh-e-salam) ney unn ka kufur mehsoos ker liya to kehney lagay Allah Taalaa ki raah mein meri madad kerney wala kaun kaun hai? Hawariyon ney jawab diya kay hum Allah Taalaa ki raah kay madadgar hain hum Allah Taalaa per eman laye aur aap gawah rahiye kay hum tabeydaar hain
